comment: This type of subversive propaganda and agitation is the same technique the Jewish Bolsheviks used to stir up the Russian populace and convinced them to go along with them (in anticipation of a "workers paradise" these Jews promised) and overthrew the Czar of Russia in . Boy, did these Russians live to regret it. Same build-up here.
